ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ نَصِيبٌ مِّمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will have a good share from what they have earned. Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are those who will surely have their share of whatsoever they have earned; for God is swift at the reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such people shall have their due share (in both the worlds) according to what they earn. And Allah is swift at settling accounts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will have their share of the reward for their deeds. God's reckoning is swift.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For such is a portion from what they have earned; and Allah is Swift At Taking Account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For them there will be alloted a share for what they have earned. And Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall have (their) portion of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those -- they shall have a portion from what they have earned; and God is swift at the reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For them there is in store a goodly portion out of that which they have earned. Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They shall have a good share from what they have earned. God is swift in His reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These! for them will be a share for that which they have earned. and Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Such shall partake of what they have earned, and Allah is swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To these will be allotted what they have earned; and Allah is quick in account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For them there will be alloted a share for what they have earned. And Allah is Swift at reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: These shall have a share of what they have earned. Swift is the reckoning of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These will have a share of what they have earned. God is swift in reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those will have a share of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:202] Those — they shall have a portion, a reward, from, as a result of, what they have earned, the deeds they have performed, such as Pilgrimage and supplication; and God is swift at reckoning, reckoning with the whole of creation in half a day of this world, as one hadīth states.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For these) who are thus (there is in store a goodly portion) a great portion in Paradise (out of that which they have earned) from their pilgrimage. (Allah is swift in reckoning) Allah says: when He takes people to task, His reckoning is swift; it is also said that this means: swift in His protection. It is said that this means: His punishment is severe towards those who show off in their devotional works. 34
